docs.lead_paragraph: One man carries a small battery- operated fan that he directs at smokers so the smoke blows back to its source. Another carries a head of garlic and chews raw cloves, breathing their fury on smokers who violate no- smoking areas. In elevator encounters with stubborn smokers, a young woman has resorted to snatching the cigarette away and stomping on it. A New York man insists on smoke- free air indoors, forcing his wife to go outside when she wants to light up. A teen-age boy covers his mouth and nose and coughs raucously whenever anyone smokes in his presence.
